item.title: Stuff/Resources I use
item.description: So this is About Stuff/Resources I use. System I have 2 Laptops: One is old like from 2014. Its a Lenovo IdeaPad G500 series laptop. My linux testing and Other things which I want to try. And You can say like Server stuff, storing Data are done on this laptop. I upgraded it with a 240gb SATA SSD AND it has 8GB Ram. But a Old Dual core processor which is not good for today’s world.
